description:
The Lanier Law Group P.A. has a law office in Winterville, North Carolina, from which we provide exceptional advocacy and support to individuals and families throughout Pitt County and beyond who are suffering needlessly as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Established in 1997, our law firm has served the residents of North Carolina for more than 23 years. During this time, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients, and we have grown to include 11 law offices across the state. This makes us one of North Carolina's more prominent and successful injury practices, and we can also assist with your workers' compensation or Social Security Disability claim.

Honored for our outstanding professionalism and service, our attorneys have earned many top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including designations as Top 100 Trial Lawyers from The National Trial Lawyers and America's Top 100 High Stakes Litigators. As proud as we are of our accolades, our true measure of success comes from how we treat our clients, and we have received numerous positive testimonials and referrals from those we have served.

Fully prepared to help improve the likelihood you will obtain the justice you deserve, the attorneys at the Lanier Law Group P.A. are ready to step in the ring and fight for what's right. To get a heavyweight in your corner who will battle on your behalf until the end, you can contact our law office or visit our website to schedule a free case evaluation. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe.
